alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 2:52PM EST until February 08 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze expected. * WHERE...Portions of northern New Hampshire and southwest and western Maine. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of drizzle or freezing drizzle may occur before snow. Precipitation falling on cold, bare surfaces may lead to icy conditions despite air temperatures that may be above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
